subject: New review (5★) of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback (from Robert C.)
description_text:
Rating: 5 | Review Text: Arrived reasonably quickly extremely good quality, the supplied brackets actually fitted my Simagic P2000 pedals.
Was easy to setup via simhub and once I had them dialed in felt pretty realistic and definitely helps having indication that ABS kicking in ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ This review was automatically published.Learn more Nice Work!
